scene_description_enriched: A seated figure, likely a man, is depicted in a red robe and a green mantle, wearing a dark hat. He is positioned next to a hexagonal table with a white tablecloth, on which rests a bowl and two small circular objects. Behind him, a large green curtain is visible. To the right, a fireplace with flames is depicted, with a jug and other objects nearby. The scene appears to be set indoors, within a domestic or monastic interior.
